Translations.Text: Bwe baayingira awaali Yusuf yasembeza gyali Mugandawe naagamba nti: mazima ddala nze Mugandawo (eyabula) kale nno tonakuwala olw'ebyo bye baakolanga
Bwe yamala okubategekera bye batwala yassa ekisena mu mugugu gwa Muganda we, olwo nno omulangirizi naalangirira nti, abange mmwe abatambuze abagenda mazima ddala mmwe muli babbi
Nebagamba nga boolekedde bali (ababagamba eby'obubbi) kiki ekibabuzeeko
Nebagamba nti ekisena kya Kabaka tetukiraba era oyo yenna anaakireeta ajja kuweebwa empeera ey'etikkibwa e ngamiya, era ekyo nze nkyeyimiridde
Nebagamba nti tulayira Katonda mazima mukimanyi tetwajja kwonoona mu nsi, (eno) era tetubangako babbi
Nebabagamba nti kibonerezo ki (ekimugwanira) bwe munaaba abalimba
Nebagamba nti ekibonerezokye, oyo yenna ekisena kya Kabaka gwe kinaasangibwa mu mugugugwe ye y'anaafuuka omutango gwa kyo, (ewaffe) bwe tutyo bwe tubonereza abeeyisa obubi

(Yusuf naayaza) nga atandikira ku migugu gya bwe nga tannatuuka ku mugugu gwa Mugandawe olwo naakijja mu mugugu gwa mugandawe, bwe tutyo bwe twayamba Yusuf naasalira bagandabe amagezi (anti) yali tayinza kusigaza mugandawe okusinziira ku nkola ya Kabaka (we Misiri) singa Katonda teyayagala, tusitula amadaala g'abo betuba twagadde era waggulu wa buli mumanyi waliyo omumanyi (asingako)
Nebagamba nti (Biniyamini) bwaba abbye Mugandawe yabba dda, Yusuf naakyesigaliza mu mutimagwe naatabaatulira, naagamba mmwe babi okusinga, era Katonda y'asinga okumanya ebyo bye mwogera
(Nebagamba nti owange ggwe Kamalabyonna mazima Biniyamini) aliko Kitaawe Musajja mukulu mukadde, kale mu kifo kye sigaza omu ku ffe, mazima tukutwala okuba nga oli mu bakozi b'obulungi
(Yusuf) naagamba nti Katonda akisse wala okuba nga tukwata atali oyo gwe tukutte n'ebintu byaffe bwe kiba kityo olwo nno tuba balyazaamaanyi
